name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Place is well kept and maintained. Bathrooms we're dry, clean. The Park persons had bird spotting informative activity for kids. The camp site was good too. It can be great place for a day trip or picnic with family and friends. Parking fee/entry fee is about $15.00.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review:
It's a very good place for a family kids. You can do a lot of activities are there are two beaches for swimming. There's no lifeguard but the water is pretty shallow.
There are campgrounds different campgrounds in this area you can go ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: was a little hard to find at first, but being our first time out here from alaska what do you expect right? quiet campground and well maintained. we will keep it on our list of nice RV parks to stay at!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Just on the outskirts of Ottawa, perfect if you just want to get away for a night or the weekend.  One side of the park is close to the highway, so a bit noisy at night.  Wood is kept in a dry place.  Only has one 3km hike.  Large beach.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Quiet but small park. Wish I could have swam but the bacteria levels were too high. The prices of kayak rentals are honestly way too high so no one was on the water. The facilities are decent. But there isn't much to do without ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Amazing Park, love the location. Very small amounts of mosquitoes. The sites are very reasonably sized. Small beach, very shallow water, lots of seaweed. Small gift shop available at the front entrance.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Bathrooms were very busy as there were not many and they were quite dirty. Nice camping sites and nice trail. The beach was very shallow, good for kids and bad for teens/ adults. The park's water went out on our last day. We will not be returning.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Good beach right close to Ottawa West and relaxed environment

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: This place is a great place for family and friends to get together,have fun and get closer to them. Lot of area , camping sites, and playgrounds for the kids to get out of your hair if need be. I love it there and so does my family.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Just outside of Ottawa and easy to get to. This local campground has some great facilities and a solid beach, for the Rideau River of course. The only downside is how close it is to a busy road, so when in your tent at night, you can really hear the cars. Other than that, we always have a great time.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice shaded private campsites, cool playground, great picnic areas. The beach is tiny and shallow. More like a large bath tub than a place to swim.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: My friends got a site at this location and invited me to come up for the day.  I went to check in at the office and ask what I need to do as my friends had a site and see my options. The young man there was very nice and told me to do ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great beach access with picnic tables for a family outing. I would give it a 5 out of 5 if it had access to any food. You can rent various aquatic crafts like paddle boards and kayaks.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Standard Ontario provincial park tenting sites and firepits. Walking trail along the river, dock and large beach with change house and playground. Two "comfort stations" and a few privys. Elevated BBQ stations (like a hibachi on a post) ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice campground, very quiet. The beach is along a river and the water seemed quite murky.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: $16 entry at time of review. Water good temp. Shallow, less weeds than other areas. BBQ pits avail. Playground on site.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: So quiet and peaceful here. Will definitely come back again. Great handicapped spots go pull in a trailer.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The park seemes to be run by students. After vague instructions where our pitch was, We drove around for ages trying to find it! Signage poor. We weren‚Äôt aware we had to fill water tank at dump station. Noisy, we were next to a road. Washrooms were dirty too. The river is nearby and very nice.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It is a very nice place to spend with family and friends, even if you want to be alone for the day, this is a good place to go read and or lay down on the beach, running or just bike. Also there is an area to camp.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park

As the young park ranger (probably the same one as ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The park itself is above average. Some of the staff were not the greatest. The supervisor did try and make a bad situation better.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review:
Loved it close to Kemptville in case you forgot something or want to get some food, groceries etc
Close to the hiway 
Friendly clean great campsites

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Another great provincial park in Ontario, fairly private forested sites not just a RV lot packed in.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Spent the Long weekend camping. Bathrooms were absolutely disgusting, rarely cleaned and full of dead moths every morning covering the floors. We always had to wait for the bathrooms as there were line ups as there were only 2 bathroom ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: A nice provincial park near Kemptville and less than an hour's drive from Ottawa. Great for pick-nicks and simple water sports.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Small, clean beach, friendly staff. Clean bathrooms. Campsites are a good size.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review:
Fireworks and the Tulip festival.
Always a good plan for the kiddos.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It's nice . But they should make price lower for daily  visitors .

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Well serviced and maintained campground but not a lot to do and rather close to the highway. Ok for an over night stay or a weekend but not a full vacation.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Family friendly camping, great facilities and awesome sandy beach!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great camp sites. great place.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: If youre going as a group ages 20-30 DO NOT waste your time. We were a group of 15 and kept getting pestered all weekend. Some of us drove for over 6 hours. Got a 180$ fine for loud noise. Neighbours did not hear us and it is FULLY UP TO ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great place for family gatherings, well kept.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Very nice park with beautiful beach

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Good private campsites. Great amenities.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Beautiful wild life

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great place for a swim and play in the sun.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Good privacy, good comfort stations, close to amenities.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: A nice place to camp close to Ottawa. I enjoyed and appreciated the kayak rentals. This place is great for groups as the camp sites are close together.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It's a nice camping site close to a beautiful  town Kempville that means it's convinient for shopping ( 5 minute distance), but a bit loud due to traffic if you camp near the roadside. Recommend riverside.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Been here many times. Wonderful memories.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice park overall, good beach and surrounding area. Nice dock area to fish from. Could use a few more washrooms but not a deal breaker. Two parks for the kids to play at, both within a few minutes walk from one another. Would camp there again, no problem...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The park is great but yesterday August 6, there was no water in the park at all, means no washrooms, when it did come back on it was no drinkable, boil first warnings.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Dogs admitted for pets lovers. Rideau River seams to be with lots of algees so not that great for swimming. Service personnel are great. There were 2 bathrooms and 4 showers though, so there was always a lineup for the bathrooms none for ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: A good quick getaway from the Ottawa area. Basic park, but lots to do in the area, and good access to watersports.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Wonderful place

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice clean park,  helpful staff

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great time and family experience!!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice park but campsites are too close from the others and you will have no privacy. Perfect for a short weekend if you don't plan to spend your time here.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice park. Well maintained. However sites close to hwy will be annoying. Not a large so no real hiking or anything. Good for fishing and boating.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Clean area, a lot to do , friendly staff.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice, quiet park.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Prices are high for not much of anything.  Park is small ... i would not bring kids because they would get bored fast!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: great private spot near the Rideau River.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Did some work there but seemed like a nice park

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Amazing!!!!!!!! My family and I love this campground. Staff are always extra friendly, beaches are nice and clean, boat ramp is close and convenient. Great having a park store, my kids love a daily ice cream :)

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The park is good but the mosquitoes are really bad as soon as you get away from the beach. Avoid bug season if you can.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: This park is not up to the regular standards of the provincial parks. The camp sites are not maintained. As soon as it rains they are flooded with water. Mud everywhere. Lots of bugs because of standing water. The garbage collection area ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Decent place for a quick weekend out of the city but not much privacy between the campsites. Great walking path next to the water though

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Went camping by myself and had a plot on a section where I was the only one. It was a very nice sized and laid out plot with ample space for my 8 person tent as well as the picnic table and fire pit. Services provided were excellent. The ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Not bad.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great camping spot, and fantastic for cross country skiing during the winter.  We really enjoy our time there.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: When we booked out site, the online reservation system showed 2 sites available, both closer to the road away from the water.  After we set up on a very small, narrow and uneven site and started to explore, we realized that half the ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park however, very weedy for swimming

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Some sites are hard to get trailer into.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Love the views, and the friendly service. We also love the setting of the park with playground, hiking trails, boating dock and swimming areas. However, we were disappointed that we couldn't swim due to the bacteria notice. So we rented out the canoe and fishing rods and went fishing instead.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Generally clean.  Lots are large and very nice.  We do tent camping and it was ideal.  Beach is nice as well.   The camp ground is however lacking in facilities.  Bathrooms are clean but lineups were long.  For the size of the park I ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: very disappointing.  The beach sections were extremely small and water would only go up to your waist at best, not bad if you have very young children.  The section that was designated for "dogs" wasn't even accessible, you had to go ...

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The week we were here it was very quiet even though our section was full, staff were great to deal with.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Poor example of a provincial park, no park staff were available over our entire visit, no map, no firewood, and nobody was available to check in with. Pretty noisy as well with the road on one side and the boats on the river. I'll skip this one next time.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: When We came there on May 21st, park closed. We parked our car outside and walked in. It is good for family or group gathering. No trail. Heavy mosquitos.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Nice and clean campgrounds with clean amenities. Picturesque water front.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It's less then an hour from Ottawa and is a great provincial park! The  sites are great lots of privacy.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The campground has very poor drainage leading to very muddy sites and a heavy presence of mosquitos. The lack of natural drainage is compounded by the facility's failure to maintain ditches; the remnants of ditches can be seen in some places.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Excellent park !

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Lovely water...no racoons and the mosquitoes were manageable.üôÉ

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Beautiful river. Nice scenery. Alot of bugs though

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: We had a fun weekend with the family.  Nice site, flat and shaded.  Near the water and still near the washrooms (which were clean, always a good thing).  Close by to all stores.  We hope to return

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Absolutely beautiful, visited in spring and it was gorgeous but muddy would great for a family camping trip or even a nice walk.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Beautiful and tranquil. Perfect place for camping

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Awesome place!

review: Swimming area has nice sand. Lots of bugs but that is to be expected in the woods

name: Rideau River Provincial Park

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Very nice park.  Our site was flooded when we got there and the moved us!!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Spacious campsites. The park rangers were always on the lookout for and rowdy or noisy campers and quickly put an end to it. Sires are kept clean and the washrooms and showers, although they could be crowded were kept clean.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park. Rangers patrolled regularly, quieting folks at night. Good kid programing, nice sites.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: What a fun spot- lots to do, fishing courses for kids, and nice beach.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Clean well kept..staff is so kind

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Family oriented provincial park on the banks of the Rideau with a nice Beach

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: The bathroom smells awful.  The beach is nearly non existent and I'm pretty sure mosquitoes were invented here.  Not worth the $14 entry fee

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It was nice, only down fall was other people coming and going who disregarded the max speed which was 20ks, my daughter whos 4 who ran ahead of me nearly got hit by an idiot going 40. We were right by the washrooms and showers and the beach was lovely.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Parking is expensive, and to reserve a picnic spot is also very expensive. Washrooms are not checked during the day and are disgusting!!!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Night wardens were two younger people, very rude. Were the only site occupied in our section and kept pestering us.

review: Love this place

review: Campsites are pretty close to the water, close to Kemptville but not too close.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Camp sites do not have very much privacy and swimming is only good for small children.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Good park for a quick weekend getaway

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Great spot! Just out of the city it was close but far enough to get away for a night or two!

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: Sites are a nice size and the river is good around there.  Some sites are close to a busy highway which is annoying at night

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: It was just an okay campsite. The grounds were uneven and when it rained there was a collection of puddles. The beaches are full of water weeds and the main beach was pretty small and shallow. Other than that the facilities were great, good maintenance, and garbage pick up was often.

name: Rideau River Provincial Park
review: A busy but very nice place to camp or visit.
